cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Nov 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Nov 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: King Studio private room motel style. It has a King bed. Sleeps 2. Own bathroom, kettle, microwave, fridge, TV, air com, outdoor table and chairs.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Queen Studio standalone Villa which has 1 X Queen Bed. Has own bathroom, kitchenette, Fridge, TV, Air Conditioner, Kettle, Toaster, Coffee and Tea, Iron, Hair Dryer and a patio with garden views.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
